title: Temples - Music Pack
description: 13 Original Temple/Dungeon Tracks all with different themes to fit all kinds of different Temple themes (desert, underwater, space etc.)
longDescription:
Listen to this Music here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-K8VbfqrSSQ


13 Original Temple/Dungeon tracks, with different themed areas, meant to cast a wide net over any type of Dungeon/Temple you may have in your game. All are vaguely dark and mysterious, and made with mostly all Old/Ancient instruments, in order to give it a more timeless quality (no bright synths or electronic drums)


These songs do have some sound effects baked in to the songs themselves to make them more atmospheric. If you'd like any changes to these songs, I'd be happy to oblige and help make my music more suited for your game. (small changes like a certain sound removed or certain Instrument volume changes) email me at mattlaceymusic@gmail.com for these changes.


All I ask of those using the music is a "Music by Matt Lacey" credit in the games credits!
technicalDetails:
Track List:

  • Sacred Temple
  • Desert Temple
  •  Jungle Temple
  • Ancient Factory
  • Temple of the Condemned
  • Ritual
  • Demon Temple
  • Underwater Temple
  • Hidden Temple
  •  Frozen Temple
  • Moon Temple
  • Soul Temple
  • Storm Tower


Number of Audio Wavs: 13

Number of Audio Cues: 13

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz)

Does music loop: YES

Minutes of audio provided: 50

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Important/Additional Notes: For use in a game, please add a "Composer/Music By" for me, Matt Lacey, in the game's credits, Thanks!c
